name: Pollen Run
description:
This is a game I made in 6 days for a spring jam! It's a beat-your-score, survival vertical scroller in which you play as a bee and pollinate flowers during spring time!

I made it in Unreal Engine and I recorded the whole thing and shrunk it down to a time-lapse you can view here:

Feel free to skim through it and take a look at how I did certain things! :)
